about_the_game:
Dr. Lin Hao spent ten minutes fully understanding the infinite monkey theorem and decided to conduct an experiment with cats. However, how could he verify the infinite monkey theorem with only three cats under his command?

He decided to let the cat work day and night, using unlimited time to pile up Shakespeare's works! He called it the Infinite Cat Project.

This is a typing-themed placement game. In the game, you are hired to manage cats. Please work hard to achieve the Infinite Cat Project!

In this game:

Shakespeare's Works Template - No need to worry about typing mistakes! By purchasing templates and inputting the corresponding content of the templates, a large number of cat coins can be obtained. Cat coins are used to purchase props and upgrade.

Three professional typing cats - working 24 hours a day without interruption! You can hire three lovely cats to help type. These cats have lovely animations and professional abilities. You can continue to upgrade them to obtain a faster typing speed.

Powerful facilities and props - logistics support is very sufficient! By purchasing props, you can greatly improve the typing efficiency of cats. There are also other auxiliary props to help you automate.

TIPS:

Cats are crepuscular animals, that means they work more efficiently in dim conditions! Remember to purchase props to control lighting when managing cats!

Press down your mouse and slide on the keyboard for quick input.

name: Infinity Cats Project

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i5-9600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win10
  • Processor: i5-11400F
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: N/A
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

short_description: This is a typing-themed placement game. In the game, you can hire three cute kittens to type for you. At the same time, purchase various props to improve typing speed. Watch the cute cats typing and enjoy your relaxing and leisure moments here!
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
